attributes.action: change the laws on driving to punish people who cause congestion on motorways
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many people use the middle lane on motorways to cruise along instead of it's intended use, this being overtaking traffic.

This causes congestion and accidents.  This inconsiderate behaviour should be brought under the banner of driving without due care and attention, as the people who do this have no care and consideration for other motorway users
